0.6.name: wordpress/ruler-analytics
0.6.description:
Measure your Marketing

Do you know where your leads, sales & phone calls come from?

Try Ruler Analytics for free to discover this and more...

Ruler Analytics makes measuring your marketing activities simple. Ruler allows you to track every conversion (lead or sale), company who visited your site and phone call back to the original source from which it was generated including the website, search engine and keyword.

For more information visit:

Ruler Analytics
